meanings.sent1: She pawked at the fragile vase, causing it to fall and break.
meanings.sent2: Please be careful not to pawk the delicate equipment while moving it.
meanings.sent3: He tried to pawk the puzzle pieces together, but they kept slipping out of place.
meanings.sent4: The toddler's attempt to pawk the buttons on the remote resulted in changing all the settings.
meanings.sent5: The chef's decision to pawk at the dough too roughly ruined the texture of the bread.

meanings.sent1: The new employee was a real pawk and kept dropping things in the office.
meanings.sent2: Don't be a pawk and make sure to follow the instructions carefully.
meanings.sent3: Despite being a pawk, he always managed to bring a smile to everyone's face with his jokes.
meanings.sent4: She felt like a pawk in the dance class, tripping over her own feet constantly.
meanings.sent5: The little boy was known as the class pawk for his tendency to spill his lunch everywhere.

meanings.sent1: The kitten playfully batted at the toy with its tiny pawk.
meanings.sent2: The dog's wet pawk left muddy prints all over the clean floor.
meanings.sent3: She felt a gentle tap on her shoulder and turned to see a furry pawk reaching out to her.
meanings.sent4: The squirrel used its nimble pawks to quickly climb up the tree.
meanings.sent5: The rabbit's soft pawks left imprints in the fresh snow as it hopped along.
